channel.title: Blogs on Devwhoops.io
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Devwhoops.io

item.title: Event Driven Python Aws
item.description: #CloudGuruChallenge - Event Driven Python on AWS After being asked by many friends about transitioning into a DevOps role with no background; I began doing some digging and stumbled upon the Cloud Resume Challenge. The book opens up with a story about a plumber learning to code while dealing with literal shit, then proceeds to give the curious an open-ended challenge to complete. Some further digging I stumbled upon A Cloud Guru’s Event-Driven Python challenge and decided to jump in as a means to overcome my fear of serverless functions and build some new skills.

item.title: Terratest: Diving Into Infrastructure Testing
item.description: The Story Thus Far… For the past 3 years, after landing my first “DevOps Engineer” position, just year after college. I have been asking the following question “How do I become more developer minded?” or “What exactly am I supposed to develop?” I was fortunate or rather unlucky depending on how you see it, to have landed a devops role after doing a few months of Linux Support and another few months as an internal Sysadmin.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello World! Welcome to my blog, where I will share my knowledge and experiences building reliable infrastructure, solving coding problems and navigating the tech and gaming industry. I hope you are able to benefit from my experiences in software. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions!
